p.s: Transliterates non-latin character sets to latin
p.d: This extension allows you to transliterate text in non-latin characters (such as Chinese, Cyrillic, Greek etc) to latin characters. Besides the transliteration the extension also contains filters to upper- and lowercase latin, cyrillic and greek, and perform special forms of transliteration such as converting ligatures such as the Norwegian "Ã¦" to "ae" and normalizing punctuation and spacing.
